metadata.description:
"Take a journey back in time to the roaring twenties, in a tale of mystery, grand adventure, and love.

Join Emma G. Wildford in a Gatsby-era globetrotting search for her missing fiancé – beautifully illustrated by Edith and evocatively written by Zidrou.

Shortlisted at the Angouleme International Comics Festival 2018."
metadata.name: Emma G. Wildford
